examples.text: Q2 delivered accelerating growth with healthy underwriting and continued expense discipline. Momentum was strongest in Car and across Europe.
examples.notes: Paraphrases themes from Q2 2025 shareholder letter.

examples.text: Gross margin expanded year over year, while operating efficiency improved. Our reinsurance program continues to reduce earnings volatility.
Our AI‑native stack improves risk selection and customer experience, enabling instant quotes and faster claims decisions at scale.
examples.notes: Strategy emphasis; consistent with prior communications.

examples.text: Giveback remains core to our model, channeling unused premiums to nonprofits selected by customers in the U.S. and Europe.
